testcase.name: verifyCategoryPageUI
testcase.system-out: Step 1: Login to the application Step 2: Navigate to Category Creation Page Step 3: Verifying Page Header... -> [PASS] Header text verified successfully. Step 4: Verifying Breadcrumbs... -> [PASS] Breadcrumb sequence is correct. Step 5: Verifying Action Icons... -> [PASS] Edit Icon is visible and clickable. -> [PASS] Delete Icon is visible and clickable.
